title:
Visuals form identity & speak 
for your brand.
body:
# Meet me

First of all I’m a big admirer and collector of everyday object with the belief that they can evoke emotions in the viewer’s eyes.

A still life and product photographer working solo or in the assistance of my two dogs. My practice focuses on setting direction in your content through sensibility, colors and set design.

International availability gives me opportunity to meet and work with passionate product owners all around the world. You are a product owner? I love to hear your story.
